welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Webster Groves! Known for its rich history, picturesque parks, and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport is dedicated to serving low-cost and regional airlines.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport is primarily used for cargo and private flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights, providing a more luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Alton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Belleville Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
